title: Unchained Alistar
body: Can someone help me get Unchained Alistar Skin? It always says error when I ever try to obtain it via subscribing through my email account on League of Legends. {{champion:12}} {{item:1031}}

replies.body: We'd like to help with this!  As DTN suggested, please submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to look into this for you, and try to unleash the beast!

Submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with at least 'Unchained Alistar' in the title and Blitzcrank Bot should be able to add him to your account automatically.
